title: Johnson & Johnson Covid-19 Booster Shot Endorsed by FDA Advisers
sub_head: The experts, whose recommendations are often followed by the FDA, said the agency should clear the extra dose for adults
body:
Advisers to the Food and Drug Administration voted unanimously Friday to recommend the agency authorize an extra dose of Johnson & Johnson â€™s Covid-19 vaccine, to shore up protection against the coronavirus.
The panel of outside doctors and experts voted 19-0 to recommend that all adults who received a first dose of the J&J vaccine should get the second dose at least two months later.
